name: The North Face Class V Belted Shorts - Women's
description:
Lightweight, quick-drying shorts for exploring a sandy beach or a backyard BBQ. Equipped with FlashDry™, the Class V shorts feel dry and comfortable in humid conditions or tropical settings. This treatment doesn’t add weight and never washes or wears out.Stretchy recycled nylon blend with FlashDry (PFC-free DWR) speeds up dry time.Partially exposed webbing belt lets you find your perfect fit.Hand pockets and zippered rear pocket leave lots of room for essentials.Standard fit.

        Sustainability
